entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023
